name: Kernel Panik!
description:
Kernel Panik!

A Godot Wild Jam #51 submission.

As the latest in server farm management technology, your job as the Servbot 3000 is to take your corporate masters' profits to the moon!

Install shiny new parts, purchase powerful upgrades, and network your way to record-breaking profits. If you make enough profit, you can buy your ticket for the rocket waiting outside!

Control your Servbot 3000 with WASD and interact/place components by holding E.

Use Esc to exit menus or pause the game.

Features

- Purchase and install server components

- Add more power capacity to your facility

- Purchase upgrades for each component type

- Launch a rocket to win the game!

Credits
